description: Gashadokuro is a large skeleton sealed under the fourth seal, he is a follower of Hagoromo-Gitsune. He appears at the seal to fight. He later appears at the castle and tries to devour Nurarihyon. Ibaraki Douji told him to get out of the way after he blocked Ibaraki Douji`s way to Nurarihyon.
name: Gashadokuro
